A national emergency represents a dangerous abuse of presidential power. There is no 'national emergency' at our border. This President knows it, his enablers in Congress know it, and our democracy will not tolerate it.
America is not a nation built on fear. We are a nation of immigrants and I will not stand idly by as this President continues to traffic in hate to promote his political agenda. Enough is enough.
